verses.verse: Though <S%G1437><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of angels, <S%G32><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> charity, <S%G26><s%> I am become <S%G1096><s%> as sounding <S%G2278><s%> brass, <S%G5475><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a tinkling <S%G214><s%> cymbal. <S%G2950><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> the gift of prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> understand <S%G1492><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> mysteries, <S%G3466><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge; <S%G1108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> I could remove <S%G3179><s%> mountains, <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> charity, <S%G26><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> I bestow all my goods to feed <S%G5595><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G5224><s%> the poor, and <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> I give <S%G3860><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> be burned, <S%G2545><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> charity, <S%G26><s%> it profiteth <S%G5623><s%> me nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

Charity <S%G26><s%> suffereth long, <S%G3114><s%> and is kind; <S%G5541><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> envieth <S%G2206><s%> not; <S%G3756><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> vaunteth not itself, <S%G4068><s%> <S%G3756><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> puffed up, <S%G5448><s%>

Doth not <S%G3756><s%> behave itself unseemly, <S%G807><s%> seeketh <S%G2212><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> her own, <S%G1438><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> easily provoked, <S%G3947><s%> thinketh <S%G3049><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> evil; <S%G2556><s%>
Rejoiceth <S%G5463><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> iniquity, <S%G93><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> rejoiceth <S%G4796><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> truth; <S%G225><s%>
Beareth <S%G4722><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> hopeth <S%G1679><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> endureth <S%G5278><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

Charity <S%G26><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> faileth: <S%G1601><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> there be prophecies, <S%G4394><s%> they shall fail; <S%G2673><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> there be tongues, <S%G1100><s%> they shall cease; <S%G3973><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> there be knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> it shall vanish away. <S%G2673><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part, <S%G3313><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we prophesy <S%G4395><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part. <S%G3313><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> that which is perfect <S%G5046><s%> is come, <S%G2064><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> which is in <S%G1537><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> shall be done away. <S%G2673><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> a child, <S%G3516><s%> I spake <S%G2980><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child, <S%G3516><s%> I understood <S%G5426><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child, <S%G3516><s%> I thought <S%G3049><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child: <S%G3516><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> I became <S%G1096><s%> a man, <S%G435><s%> I put away <S%G2673><s%> childish things. <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3516><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> now <S%G737><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> a glass, <S%G2072><s%> darkly; <S%G1722><s%> <S%G135><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> face: <S%G4383><s%> now <S%G737><s%> I know <S%G1097><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part; <S%G3313><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall I know <S%G1921><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I am known. <S%G1921><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> charity, <S%G26><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> three; <S%G5140><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the greatest <S%G3187><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> is charity. <S%G26><s%>
